column5: Yes I have. Itâ€™s shocking to her therapist what she was told

Sheâ€™s in therapy to. My x told her that her brother came home to our house got my gun and shot himself in his bedroom. It was extremely damaging telling her that. I had only told her he got hurt really bad and his heart stopped. My x is a evil person. Trying to help her through what her mom told her is very difficult

Her phone number is attached to his account when I try to rest it. 

She be my 2 year old son until his head was black and blue. Felony child abuse. Sheâ€™s a horrible person
Please talk to your dad. If he doesnâ€™t help ask anyone. Lots of people care
That is beautiful. I admire your outlook I pray someday I will feel like the emotions in those words.

Well really hope you donâ€™t do it. I lost my son and it is horrible. I donâ€™t whatâ€™s going on with you but I care about everyone. A lot of people do. I hope you find a outlet to find help. I donâ€™t know what itâ€™s like to have suicidal thoughts. I do know how much people are missed and how much heartache goes around here on earth. I hope you stay. If you need help reach out. I would help any I could if you need.
He will forgive itâ€™s not a hell bound sin. He would be sad just like people hear on earth. I hope you dont. If your thinking about it reach out someone.
Are you doing better? Have contacted anyone?
How is taking your life easy? I donâ€™t want anyone to die, but I donâ€™t think itâ€™s easy.

I wish I knew to. After my son passed away in January I found some writing of his of how he didnâ€™t want to go to a hospital or back to counseling, he was scared of having to do that. So he hid it so well, I had no idea. The one time he was hospitalized in the mental heath unit for cutting made him chose death over having to go back. The doctor nor his counselor ever thought or said he was suicidal. He was 13. It is terrible him and others feel scared or ashamed of an illness that they would rather die. Mental health and suicide I hope someday will be comfortable for people to talk about without reservations.
I hope you here on earth. Lots of people will help.
Please just keeping on. And please ask for help. If you donâ€™t get it ask someone else. I promise you lots of people care

Donâ€™t let your anxiety make you think youâ€™re annoying or a burden. You didnâ€™t come this far just to come this far. Trust me when I say we are devastated. Our 13 year old was where you are right now. He didnâ€™t reach out for help. You are. Please take this as a sign that you are needed, and loved.
Thank you, and I am sorry for your loss. Itâ€™s a terrible club to be in
Well i care, and hope you find some peace
It might surprise you how it would turn out to talk to someone if you can just reach out to someone.
It might seem that way but you are not a burden. Thatâ€™s the bottom line,
I care. Many people care, I hope you get through the dark moments and talk to someone soon. Everyone is worthy, and those that say otherwise are wrong.
There are some helpful groups on Facebook for suicide loss as well if you are on Facebook.

Reach out to anyone. Call anyone you know. My son was 13 and is no longer with us. Everyone is important, you and all the people that it would devastate. Please reach out to someone anyone at all that is close to help.

I can only tell you what I know for certain. my son was also fearful of going to the hospital. I found out after his death.  Itâ€™s okay to seek help. Many many people will help just reach out. My sons death devastated me and many others. I hope you hang in there and reach out for help. Itâ€™s okay to do that
Because itâ€™s devastating to everyone. I have no idea whatâ€™s going on and hope you power through the dark moments.

Sorry for your loss. I struggle deeply my son didnâ€™t leave a note or something. He sent a goodbye video to his friends minutes before he passed away. Iâ€™m sure he had his reasons. Mabey it was to hard to tell me? I donâ€™t know what think. I desperately miss him and wish I understood.

It is truly an unexplainable feeling.  I had no idea my son was thinking about suicide. I was shocked and in disbelief when the police called. A matter of minutes from the call to his death. I donâ€™t think Iâ€™ll ever understand. Iâ€™m very sorry for your lossðŸ’”
Glad hear this. Keep on keeping on
Thank you both, sorry for your losses too. I lost my son January 21st. I have go back to work next week and Iâ€™m dreading it. I miss him and have so much sorrow. Trying to wrap my head around it.
Thank you all. Be safe. Live life, it will get better if you struggling just reach there is lots of love in world.
He enjoyed that kind of stuff. Thank you
Thank you much. I will message you
Thank you for telling me. Could ask if it was good interaction? He seemed happy lately I just donâ€™t understand.
I appreciate your thoughts. I hadnâ€™t looked t at it that way. It might be better not to see but thatâ€™s tough. He was 13, and wish I had known.
Also it was me on his account.
Thank you much
